item.title: 帕拉丁能源公司因极端天气影响生产而暴跌
item.description: 帕拉丁能源有限公司（Paladin Energy Ltd.）股价暴跌，原因是这家澳大利亚铀矿开采商撤回了 2025 财年的生产指标，而此前纳米比亚矿山因极端降雨导致生产中断。【原文：Paladin Energy Ltd. shares tumbled after the Australian uranium miner withdrew production guidance for the 2025 fiscal year following disruptions at its Namibia mine caused by extreme rainfall.】

item.title: 英国石油和天然气许可证遭环保组织起诉
item.description: 一个自然保护组织正在伦敦法院就 31 个北海石油和天然气勘探许可证向英国政府提出质疑，该组织称这些许可证可能会危及海洋保护区和气候稳定。【原文：A conservation group is challenging Britain’s government in a London court over 31 North Sea oil and gas exploration licenses that it says could put marine protected areas and climate stability at risk.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存大幅下降，石油上涨
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国原油库存大幅缩减之后，石油价格出现上涨，同时市场也在权衡俄罗斯和乌克兰在黑海停火的前景。【原文：Oil rose after an industry report signaled a major contraction in US crude stockpiles, while the market weighed the prospect of a Russia-Ukraine ceasefire in the Black Sea.】

item.title: 中国顶级手机制造商希望到 2027 年 70% 的销售额来自海外
item.description: 随着全球最大手机市场的饱和，中国第一大智能手机制造商vivo希望在两年内将来自东南亚等海外市场的销售额提高到占收入的70%，加快其全球扩张步伐。【原文：China’s No. 1 smartphone maker Vivo wants to increase sales from overseas markets like Southeast Asia to as much as 70% of revenue in two years, accelerating its global push as the world’s biggest handset market saturates.】

item.title: 全球银行裁员促使人才流向香港的中国竞争对手
item.description: 多年来，中资银行一直在香港赢得华尔街公司的业务。现在，在经历了一波裁员潮之后，它们开始重新吸纳一些前员工。【原文：For years, Chinese banks have been winning business from Wall Street firms in Hong Kong. Now they’re starting to pick up some of their former staff after a wave of layoffs.】

item.title: 23andMe 称用户匆忙删除数据后 "延迟 "问题已解决
item.description: 23andMe 公司周二表示，该公司的网站出现了延迟，因为有一大批客户要求删除他们的基因数据，然后再通过计划中的破产拍卖出售这些数据。【原文：23andMe Inc. said Tuesday that it experienced website delays, after a wave of customers sought to delete their genetic data before it can be sold through a planned bankruptcy auction.】

item.title: 美国股市连续第三天上涨，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在大型科技股尾盘反弹帮助美国基准股市实现第三天上涨之后，亚洲股市有望上扬，尽管贸易战风险对市场情绪造成了影响。【原文：Stocks in Asia are poised to advance after a late rally in big tech helped the US benchmark eke out a third day of gains, though trade war risks weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 航空公司提前数年预订喷气机维修显示供应紧张
item.description: 全球最大的喷气式飞机大修和发动机维修公司之一的负责人表示，由于供应链问题导致关键零部件和维修服务供应紧张，航空公司纷纷提前数年预订飞机维修，以确保获得维修档期。【原文：Airlines are booking in their planes for maintenance years ahead of time in order to secure a slot as supply chain issues crimp the availability of crucial parts and servicing, the head of one of the world’s biggest jet overhaul and engine servicing firms said.】

item.title: 里夫斯将削减英国数十亿英镑开支：值得关注
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在削减数十亿英镑的英国政府开支时，将把责任归咎于全球经济逆风，而她自己所在的工党内部则越来越多地批评她有疏远选民的风险。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will blame global economic headwinds as she slashes UK government spending by billions of pounds, in the face of growing criticism from within her own Labour Party that she risks alienating voters.】

item.title: 普京从中国的俄罗斯杂货热潮中获得软实力胜利
item.description:
销售俄罗斯产品的商店已遍布中国，现在莫斯科正抓住这一商机，计划进行大规模扩张。【原文：

Stores selling Russian products have spread across China, and now Moscow is seizing on the interest with a plan for a major expansion of its own.

item.title: GameStop 将与其他公司一起为比特币预留现金
item.description: GameStop Corp.是一家陷入困境的视频游戏零售商，曾在2021年的meme股票狂潮中成为零售交易商的最爱，该公司表示，其董事会已经批准了一项将比特币作为国库储备资产的计划。【原文：GameStop Corp., the struggling video-game retailer that became a favorite of retail traders during the meme stock frenzy in 2021, said its board has approved a plan to add Bitcoin as a treasury reserve asset.】

item.title: 顶级肉类加工企业 JBS 因鸡肉和猪肉需求实现盈利增长
item.description: 由于对鸡肉和猪肉的强劲需求帮助抵消了美国牛肉业务的压力，全球最大的肉类加工企业 JBS SA 公布的盈利超出预期。【原文：JBS SA, the world’s largest meatpacker, posted earnings that beat expectations as strong demand for chicken and pork helped offset pressure in its US beef business.】

item.title: 特使警告加拿大不要将中国作为与美国讨价还价的 "筹码
item.description: 中国大使警告加拿大政府不要在与美国的贸易谈判中将中国作为 "讨价还价的筹码"，但表示如果加拿大取消对中国投资的壁垒，中国愿意寻求双边自由贸易协定。【原文：China’s ambassador warned the Canadian government against using it as a “bargaining chip” in trade negotiations with the US, but said it’s ready to pursue a bilateral free trade agreement if Canada removes barriers to Chinese investment.】

item.title: 美国工人联合会称安科拉公司旨在出售大河钢铁以资助美国钢铁复兴
item.description: 美国钢铁工人联合会（United Steelworkers）称，一位激进投资者希望出售美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.【原文：The United Steelworkers said an activist investor wants to sell United States Steel Corp.’s state-of-the-art mills to fund sweeping upgrades of union-run facilities that date back to the days of Andrew Carnegie.】

item.title: 期权交易员下调今年美国降息预期
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统在关税问题上的态度有所缓和，期权和期货交易商们纷纷押注，美联储将不必为抵御经济衰退而大幅降息。【原文：As President Donald Trump moderates his approach on tariffs, options and futures traders are betting that the Federal Reserve won’t have to cut interest rates as much to fend off a recession.】

item.title: 关税不确定性导致魁北克赤字加深、增长放缓
item.description: 加拿大第二大省魁北克省预测下一财年将出现 136 亿加元（约合 95 亿美元）的巨额赤字，并警告说预算前景取决于与美国贸易战的持续时间和严重程度。【原文：Quebec, Canada’s second-largest province, forecast a staggering C$13.6 billion ($9.5 billion) deficit next fiscal year, and warned that the budgetary outlook depends on the duration and severity of the trade war with the US.】

item.title: Balyasny 的 5000 万美元薪酬交易吸引了 Citadel 交易员 Brodsky
item.description: 德米特里-巴利亚斯尼（Dmitry Balyasny）的股票投资团队又添一名高薪雇员：Citadel 交易员 David Brodsky 专攻健康类股票。【原文：Dmitry Balyasny has added another expensive hire to his equities investing team: Citadel trader David Brodsky, who specializes in health stocks.】

item.title: 克利夫-阿斯内斯的 AQR 以 "投资失败 "为由抨击缓冲-ETF 热潮
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）公开反对在股票下跌期间限制损失的期权驱动型基金的兴起，声称这种日益增长的投资组合保险形式与更简单的替代品相比，收益更低，风险更大。【原文：AQR Capital Management has come out swinging against the rise of options-powered funds that limit losses during stock downturns, claiming this growing form of portfolio insurance delivers lower returns — with more risk — than simpler alternatives.】

item.title: 各国称马斯克的宽带卫星需要长期成本
item.description: 特朗普政府正在对一项价值 420 亿美元的宽带补贴计划进行修改，该计划将使埃隆-马斯克的 Starlink 等卫星互联网提供商受益，但一些州和联邦官员担心，这项技术还不够强大，无法以负担得起的价格大规模连接美国人。【原文：The Trump administration is making changes to a $42 billion broadband subsidy program that will benefit satellite internet providers like Elon Musk’s Starlink, but some state and federal officials worry the technology isn’t robust enough to connect Americans on a mass scale and at affordable rates.】

item.title: 贝恩资本将收购 Ambienta 旗下软件公司 Namirial
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本正在从私募股权公司 Ambienta 收购 Namirial SpA 的多数股权，对这家意大利软件开发商的估值为 11 亿欧元（12 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital is acquiring a majority stake in Namirial SpA from private equity firm Ambienta, valuing the Italian software developer at €1.1 billion ($1.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: AT&T 正在洽谈收购 Lumen 的消费光纤部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，AT&T 公司正在洽谈收购 Lumen Technologies 公司的消费光纤业务。【原文：AT&T Inc. is in talks to acquire Lumen Technologies Inc.’s consumer fiber operations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: ChatGPT 现在可以更好地编辑照片并创建工作图表
item.description: OpenAI 正在使 ChatGPT 更容易编辑图片，并为包含冗长、易读文本的工作创建视觉效果，这可能会扩大聊天机器人对企业和普通用户的吸引力。【原文：OpenAI is making it easier to edit images in ChatGPT and create visuals for work that include lengthy, legible text, potentially broadening the chatbot’s appeal for businesses and everyday users.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行估值达 1000 亿欧元 欧盟银行历史性反弹
item.description: 随着投资者越来越多地涌入银行业，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）成为欧盟近十年来首家估值超过 1,000 亿欧元（1,080 亿美元）的银行。【原文：Banco Santander SA has become the first bank currently in the European Union in almost a decade to be valued at more than €100 billion ($108 billion) as investors increasingly pile into the sector.】

item.title: 胡塞武装袭击聊天中心活动人士青睐的信号应用程序
item.description: 特朗普政府官员用来讨论攻击也门胡塞叛军的消息应用程序 Signal 是由一名曾经的无政府主义者创建的，目的是帮助活动家、记者和其他人在政府情报机构的窥探范围之外进行交流。【原文：The messaging app Signal that Trump administration officials used to discuss an attack on Yemen’s Houthi rebels was created by a one-time anarchist to help activists, journalists and others communicate beyond the prying eyes of government intelligence agencies.】

item.title: 关税激怒债券，DoubleLine 的谢尔曼开始防守
item.description: 双线资本（DoubleLine Capital）的杰弗里-谢尔曼（Jeffrey Sherman）对试图应对关税威胁和经济忧虑的债券投资者有一个忠告：现在不是大起大落的时候。【原文：DoubleLine Capital’s Jeffrey Sherman has a word of advice for bond investors trying to navigate tariff threats and economic worries: now is not the time to take big swings.】

item.title: 约翰-艾尔沃德的索纳公司从美国银行和巴克莱银行聘请高级经理人
item.description: 约翰-艾尔沃德（John Aylward）的索纳资产管理公司（Sona Asset Management）为其投资团队聘请了两名高级经理，这家信贷公司将继续进行全球扩张。【原文：John Aylward’s Sona Asset Management hired two senior managers for its investment team as the credit firm continues its global expansion.】

item.title: 苹果准备在 6 月 9 日的开发者大会上发布新软件
item.description: 苹果公司计划于 6 月 9 日举行年度全球开发者大会，预计届时将宣布重新设计的 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 操作系统。【原文：Apple Inc. plans to hold its annual Worldwide Developers Conference during the week of June 9, when it’s expected to announce redesigned iPhone, iPad and Mac operating systems.】
